data.name: Tetrix 3D Demo
data.detailed_description:
Try a 3D remake of the ageless classic puzzle game, a well-known Tetris gameplay with new features. Move, rotate blocks, clear lines!

Play in the Classic Mode with ordinary tetromino blocks and 12 lines of pit depth. Set new records.

Enjoy the gameplay with pleasant music in up to 4k resolution.
data.about_the_game:
Try a 3D remake of the ageless classic puzzle game, a well-known Tetris gameplay with new features. Move, rotate blocks, clear lines!

Enjoy the gameplay with pleasant music in up to 4k resolution.
data.short_description: Try a 3D remake of the ageless classic puzzle game, a well-known Tetris gameplay with new features. Move, rotate blocks, clear lines!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista (32, 64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3, 1gb video ram
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista (32, 64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3, 1gb video ram
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
